pullRequest.title: GUI: Introduce password strength check for presence of login
pullRequest.bodyText:
Check that password doesn't contain login (case insensitive
and unaccented) or backwards login.
Login is checked only if longer than 2 chars to prevent
false positive on short strings.

nodes.bodyText: Do you need to perform these checks? Wouldn't the following conditions handle these situations?

commit.message:
GUI: Introduce password strength check for presence of login

- Check that password doesn't contain login (case insensitive
  and unaccented) or backwards login.
  Login is checked only if longer than 2 chars to prevent
  false positive on short strings.
